Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 141st overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Injured on 7/8/2015 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/19/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $1,950,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/15/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $900,000 per year...
Released by St. Louis (B) on 4/11/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 5/31/2021 to a minor league deal...
